document.full_text: the united states should focus less on china's currency practices and more on the threat to u.s. companies posed by beijing's support for state-owned enterprises, a business group said on monday.
document.title: u.s. group urges focus on china state-owned companies
lines_and_colors: the united states should focus less on china's currency practices and more on the threat to u.s. companies posed by beijing's support for state-owned enterprises, a business group said on monday.
